Music Features

Bar Crawling and YouTube Trawling

By James Bithell

In a time when popular music is littered with ready-made identikit popstars, Hatti Linnell speaks to Lewis Watson about why hard work is more important than ever.

In The Spotlight: Jaws

Alex Donaldson always has one eye on the next hype. Here, he explains 'Btown', with a little help from new best friends Jaws.

Maintaining Focus

By James Bithell

Sticking to one brand of electronic music has never crossed Sub Focus' mind. He speaks with Chris Morris about custom-built live shows, spaceship design and writing albums in bedrooms.

Harmonious Disparity

By James Bithell

Francesca Donovan talks commercialism, artistic difference and sonics with Sara Quin of twin duo Tegan and Sara.

90s child Alex Donaldson takes a look at the resurrection of the golden era of pop.

By James Bithell
